text:
MEMORIAL CENTER, PURDUE UNIVERSITY, LAFAYETTE, INDIANA
THE MIDWEST PROGRAM AIRBORNE TELEVISION INSTRUCTION
September 8, 1961
Mr. William Harley
National Association of
Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Was hington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
I have at hand the notice of the Constituent Member meeting of
the ACE. The timing on this is bad in light of the International
Seminar which starts a day or two later. Therefore, I must beg
off this time and trust we will be adquately represented by you
and Harold.
Director, Program Service
and Distribution Division
JSM:cb
